fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
~ Casual Coaxing (2-shot): Choose two targets during the night. They will be redirected to visit each other.
~ Quiet Poisoning (2-shot): During the night, target a player who whispered to you on the previous day. You will deal a Basic-tier Poison to them, killing them at the end of the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
~ You spawn alongside Romeo, and will know each otherâ€™s identities (but not share a chat).
~ If you are nightkilled, you will remain alive for the next day to speak and vote before dying at the end of it. Nothing can prevent your death that day.
